title: These things are SICK. - SNT Q25 FPV RC Car
description: Check out the Nexode 300w Charger plus a ton of other UGREEN products at  and save up to 50% for Black Friday!  The ShortCircuit shelf is a beautiful place full of gadgets that we may or may not make a video on, but when Linus saw these AliExpress FPV RC Cars, he had to try them out. With a 480P first-person view, will Linus be able to beat Bell in a race around the office?  Buy a SNT Q25 FPV RC Car on AliExpress:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Check out LTTstore's Black Friday deals at:   Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    GET MERCH:   GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE:   SPONSORS, AFFILIATES, AND PARTNERS:   PRODUCTS WE USE ON THE SHORTCIRCUIT SET:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 Small car, big fun 0:55 Unboxing and controller/goggles/car walkthrough 4:21 Initial driving impressions 5:32 Sponsor - UGREEN 6:04 Setting up FPV goggles 6:59 First-person Racing vs Bell 9:47 Overall thoughts and outro
